WbmpImage::WbmpImage (  BinData *  data,
BOOLEAN *  success = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
bin_data Pointer to a binary data stream which contains the WBMP-data. After passing the binary data stream, the stream is obtained by the WBMP-image and hence automatically released in the destructor of the WBMP-image.
success Output-parameter, which indicates whether the initialization has been successful.

virtual UINT32 WbmpImage::GetFrameDelay (  INT  frame_idx  )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Returns the time in milliseconds the specified frame should be displayed. The value Image::c_unlimited means that it should be displayed _forever_.

Implements Image.
